price: 91. ¡Así fue! Y conocíamos todo con respecto a Dhul Qarnain.
arabic: كَذَٰلِكَۖ وَقَدۡ أَحَطۡنَا بِمَا لَدَيۡهِ خُبۡرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kadhālika waqad aḥaṭnā bimā ladayhi khub'ran
